newsitem.title: USA: American Industrial opts not to buy property.
newsitem.headline: American Industrial opts not to buy property.

text.p: American Industrial Properties REIT said on Tuesday it has elected not to proceed with the purchase of an industrial property in San Antonio, Texas.

The company's decision not to buy this property resulted in the return of $1.5 million in mortgage financing proceeds which had been held pending the anticipated purchase of the property, the company said.
An American Industrial Properties spokesman said the trust found other better investment opportunities elsewhere.
